participant_1.background: two dogs live with me. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. eating is something i do when i'm bored. i've short hair. i go to the gym regularly.

participant_2.background: i volunteer in a homeless shelter. i am a professional wrestler. i enjoy being around people. in my spare time i do volunteer work.

content.text: Hey! Do you have short hair? Because I do.
